reviewText: Product content was as described.  However, I continue to search for a Dale DVD with much more racing highlights.  I watched him race for years pulling off some amazing feats and maneuvers I'm sure that were captured on film yet I find no good compilation of them.  Anyone who reads this and knows of such a video please comment on this post.

It was a great DVD about Dale Earnhardt and loved the interviews. It's a great addition to the movie "DALE" and I also have the "ESPN Sportscentury Greatest Athletes - Dale Earnhardt Jr." DVD so I have them both which are both good additions to the NASCAR related DVDs I have. I just wish them both were longer, more like the length of a movie (at least 1 hour and 30 minutes) but the 45 minutes are good enough.
This was another wonderful purchase. Fair deal good delivery time and great condition. Want anything they have go for it they will not dissapoint. Thank you
